content: Those who have achieved harmony in their thoughts, words, and actions attain true awakening.
Life is nothing but a continuous measure of our potential, the greater we stretch our capabilities the more we can gain from life.
He alone is a true warrior who maintains his integrity, courage, and patience in adversity.
In life when man does everything with love, then he still feels thirsty to do more.
Live your life smiling and laughing like flowers.
In life two types of people meet failure: one who thinks right and does not follow up with action; the other, who does the actions without thinking.
The aim of life is inner purification, courage and doing well to others. The one who sticks to them does not go astray.
Think everyday as a new life and use it wisely.
He alone lives a worthwhile life, who has a cool head, warm blood, a loving heart, and zest for life.
Collect all the experiences in life, and try to digest them by meditating upon them in silence.
Birth as a human being happens naturally, but one can obtain humaneness only by dint of strong effort.
